FOLDER.NAME: Shared_Rebates_RCI
FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Shared folder for Rebates RCI Objects

SOURCE.DESCRIPTION: This flat file is created during the T_CLAIM extract from EDW1 and alll rows are RXC claims with a Prior Authorization number. The EDW1 claim was loaded into the EDM in DWV_RBTS.V_REBATES_CLM_LKP, and then joined to the EDM view DWU_EDW.V_PHMCY_CLM_PA_XREF. If a match was found the CLM_GID and ICD_CD were extracted into this file and the file is then used in an unconnected lookup in the m_Extract_T_CLAIM_2_Split.
SOURCE.NAME: F_T_CLAIM_EDM_CLM_ICD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Add Currently Processed Flat File Name Port

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the EDW1 CLM_GID from the claim that was extracted today. Each CLM_GID found in this file had a Prior Authorization number.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CLM_GID

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the diagnosis code, initially from the CAS system data when implemented with ITPR012504 in Q1 2017. This code can hold (at this time) an ICD9 or ICD10 code value.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: ICD_CD
